title: Velo Orange: Made in Taiwan
content:
Over the past few years, we’ve spoken extensively about Taiwanese manufacturing, both with Daniel Yang’s Shop Visit to factories in Taiwan and John’s “Most All Bicycles Are Handmade” Dust-Up article. Aligned with these deep dives into global manufacturing practices, more and more brands are showcasing their own supply chain, including Velo Orange, which just posted a shop visit to its Taiwanese factory on its blog.

Roll on over and check it out to see where and how Velo Orange’s bikes are handmade (and one sweet Neutrino build)!

The post Velo Orange: Made in Taiwan appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
